content:
-Zllvm-time-trace doesn't seem to be producing any useful output on nightly. I get one line:

{"traceEvents":[{"cat":"","pid":44218,"tid":4867,"ts":0,"ph":"M","name":"process_name","args":{"name":"rustc"}},{"cat":"","pid":44218,"tid":4867,"ts":0,"ph":"M","name":"thread_name","args":{"name":""}}],"beginningOfTime":1635981475290301}
a few other people on my project are hitting this as well
is there another magic flag to pass or did something break?

That's not a recent breakage, is it? https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/commit/8ddcd1dc26bad9d97bbf34cf4fc91dbf3c153431 we probably need to call timeTraceProfilerFinishThread, but as a bonus it should be compatible with multiple threads now.
@tm thank you for the fix!
